description: ff. 262. 260 x 179mm. 21 lin. 17th cen.? Brockelmann, GAL, SII, 161 (1: no. 5); Ḥājjī Khalīfah, Kashf al-ẓunūn, col. 1786f. The work was composed after 702H.; cf. fol. 158b. Incip.: ... الحمد لله واجب الوجود ذى الطول و الجود
